item.title: Showcase
item.description: Work Experience Farmer’s Assistant Dalen Saugard May 2017 - up to now | Norway Control feeding process in sheep farm. Control lambing process and keep lambs to adult age. Land cultivation and prepare a food for winter period. Transportetion sheep to mountains and reverse. Shearing sheep.

item.title: About
item.description: I am 34. I am disciplined, sociable, responsible and with a good sense of humor. I can work both in a team and manage a team.
